text:
David Paul Greenfield (29 March 1949 – 3 May 2020) was an English keyboardist and singer-songwriter. He was a member of rock band The Stranglers. He joined the band in 1975, and played with them for 45 years until his death. He was born in Brighton, East Sussex.
Greenfield died on 3 May 2020 of heart failure caused by COVID-19, aged 71.
